@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Mixin used for the bubbling events. If you want to use this in your own model
classes, be sure that every property will call the
{@link #_applyEventPropagation} function on every change.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Apply function for every property created with the
{@link qx.data.marshal.Json} marshaler. It fires and
{@link #changeBubble} event on every change. It also adds the chaining
listener if possible which is necessary for the bubbling of the events.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} The new value of the property.
@param.description: The new value of the property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: old {var} The old value of the property.
@param.description: The old value of the property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the changed property.
@param.description: The name of the changed property.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Registers for the given parameters the changeBubble listener, if
possible. It also removes the old listener, if an old item with
a changeBubble event is given.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} The new value of the property.
@param.description: The new value of the property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: old {var} The old value of the property.
@param.description: The old value of the property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the changed property.
@param.description: The name of the changed property.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Listener responsible for formating the name and firing the change event
for the changed property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the former properties.
@param.description: The name of the former properties.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
e {qx.event.type.Data} The date event fired by the property
change.
@param.description:
The date event fired by the property
change.
